title: Woman rescued from abandoned graphite mine in Baddegama
content: A 50-year-old woman has been rescued after she had fallen into an abandoned graphite mine in Baddegama, Galle, said the police media spokesmanâ€™s office.People had heard cries from a shrub jungle area at Ampegama and informed police this morning (19).A team from Baddegama police investigated and found the woman was trapped at the bottom of the 45-feet deep graphite mine.She was retrieved and rushed to Karapitiya hospital for treatment.
